title: Chain4Travel AG Founded
text: Team formation and the start of development.

title: Private Pre-Sale of Camino Token
text: Closing the private pre-sale with 4.6M CHF from 300+ entities.

title: Establishment of the Camino Network Foundation
text: The Foundation is set up to lead the future development of the decentralized network for the global travel industry.

title: Camino Network Mainnet Launch
text: Soft launch of the mainnet in several stages. First dApps deployed on Camino Network.

title: Camino Messenger
text: Cross-chain communication and distribution via Camino Messenger, by introducing standardized communication protocols across all verticals.

title: Capital Raise
text: Focus on the ecosystem's growth with new use cases and increased transactions before listing.
